mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY INQ.INQUIRY_NO DESC) AS RN, INQ.INQUIRY_NO, INQ.USER_NO, U.NAME, INQ.TITLE, INQ.CONTENTS, INQ.CREATED_AT, INQ.SEPARATE FROM INQUIRY_T INQ INNER JOIN USER_T U ON U.USER_NO = INQ.USER_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY_ANSWER_T( ANSWER_NO , USER_NO , INQUIRY_NO , CONTENTS , CREATED_AT ) VALUES( INQUIRY_ANSWER_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{userNo} , #{inquiryNo} , #{contents} , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') )
mapper.select: SELECT INQUIRY_NO, USER_NO, TITLE, CONTENTS, CREATED_AT, SEPARATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY INQUIRY_NO DESC) AS RN, INQUIRY_NO, USER_NO, TITLE, CONTENTS, CREATED_AT, SEPARATE FROM INQUIRY_T WHERE ${column} LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%') WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
